Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All squads, immediately evacuate from the core!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina slams the launch button hard in Babylonia's command room."}
{3: 'After some loud and low rumbling, a brilliant beam is fired at the relay satellite—'}
{3: 'The entire Babylonia seems to have moved slightly.'}
{3: 'The beam then passes through the special lenses on the relay satellite, traveling around the horizon and shooting toward the space station—'}
{3: 'A high-energy beam penetrates the opening in the gravity room, striking the Punishing Virus Heteromer Core with pinpoint precision.'}
{3: 'It fiercely burns through the core, rapidly vaporizing its surface...'}
{3: 'The process is witnessed by every single member of Babylonia and the Forsaken troops...'}
{3: 'At the center of the platform in the gravity room, the burning shell of the Hetero-Core falls off, revealing a cube striped in black and red inside...'}
{3: 'The smooth and delicate surface shows no signs of damage...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'It seems that this is its true face...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What the hell? That was just a shell?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It seems that all physical traits observed by the recon teams before...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What? Hey, Gray Raven! The second round! The second round is fully charged!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The space station receives the full impact from Babylonia and begins to spin. The relay satellite can no longer aim.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What do we do, Commandant? There's nothing we can do now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We still have a chance!', 3: '60', 4: "Steady! Don't give up!", 5: '60'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There will always be a second chance...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The space station slowly spins as the scene outside the "skylight" of the room continues to change.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'More energy is being generated again... this time at its bottom...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sunlight reflected by the blue planet shines directly into the gravity room through the skylight.'}
{3: 'A shockwave emits from the base of the Hetero-Core...'}
{3: 'Wrapping some matters within, it ejects itself from the space station by pushing through the entrance of the gravity room...'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Forsaken! Retreat from the space station at once!'}
{2: 'Forsaken Construct', 3: 'The evacuation route has been sent to you, sir!'}
{3: 'Watanabe turns around, bolting toward the exit of the gravity room.'}
{3: 'Only the stunned group from Babylonia is left in the gravity room...'}
